item.title: 2024 TSE: The Plan
item.description: Ever since I first heard about the eclipse back in August of last year, I knew I wanted to try to make it to the path of totality on April 8th. I also knew that, being someone interested in photography, I would probably want to photograph it somehow. What I didn’t know about was the 6+ months and hundreds of hours I would spend learning about and practicing astrophotography, embedded programming, hardware prototyping, 3D design/integration, and software application development.
